summary: Email chain from December 2019 between attorneys Brittany Henderson and Brad Edwards discussing the sharing of documents and photographs related to a victim's encounters with Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondence involves coordination with a federal prosecutor's office.

persons.name: Brittany Henderson
persons.context: Attorney at Edwards Pottinger LLC who is coordinating the sharing of documents and photographs related to a victim's encounters with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Board Certified Trial Attorney at Edwards Pottinger LLC who is involved in sharing emails and coordinating document transfer regarding a victim's encounters with Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Both are attorneys at Edwards Pottinger LLC working together on sharing documents related to a victim's encounters with Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Meeting with victim in California
events.description: A meeting was held in California with a victim who had provided emails relating to her encounters with Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 425 North Andrews Avenue, Suite 2 (Edwards Pottinger LLC office address)
One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007 (Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York office)
keyFacts: Attorneys Brittany Henderson and Brad Edwards are coordinating the sharing of documents and photographs related to a victim's encounters with Jeffrey Epstein.
The victim had previously provided a batch of emails about her encounters with Epstein to the attorneys.
The correspondence involves coordination with the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The attorneys have two photographs of the victim from the relevant time period that they plan to share.
The document shows ongoing legal coordination in late 2019 regarding evidence collection in the Epstein case.
